title: Knife, 1985-103-115, late 17th century
markings: On blade: unidentified cutlers' mark partly filled with copper
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Blade has straight lower edge, upper edge tapering towards the point, plain bolster. Silver ferrule has engraved decoration along the rims. Tapering agate handle, round in section, flower shaped metal mount on top of handle.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
